last_episode_to_air.name: Rites of Passage (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Superboy is on the verge of losing his powers forever, which causes his alter ego of Clark Kent to search for the elusive crystal which holds the key to his past and will ultimately lead him through his "Rites Of Passage."

name: Superboy
overview: Superboy is a half-hour live-action television series based on Kal-El's early years as Superboy. It depicted Superboy's adventures during his college years, his meetings with Lex Luthor and his romance with Lana Lang. The series was brought to the screen by executive producers Ilya and Alexander Salkind, who were the producers of the first three Superman movies and the 1984 Supergirl movie.

episodes.name: The Jewel of the Techacal
episodes.overview: Lana's father, an archeologist, comes to the university with what he thinks is a cursed relic. Lex Luthor then steals the jewel in order to sell it to the highest bidder.

episodes.name: A Kind of Princess
episodes.overview: Clark falls for Sara, the daughter of a crime boss. Both Clark and Sara get stuck in the middle between rival crime syndicates, and it is up to Superboy to save everyone.

episodes.name: Back to Oblivion
episodes.overview: TJ goes to a scrap yard to investigate strange things that have happened there. When he arrives, he is trapped in a crushing machine by the old man, Mr. Wagner, who owns the scrap yard.

episodes.name: The Russian Exchange Student
episodes.overview: When a scientist's formula to improve the efficiency of gasoline is nearly destroyed, a Russian exchange student named Natasha is accused of sabotaging the computer that the formula was stored on.

episodes.name: Countdown to Nowhere
episodes.overview: The world first learns of the new hero, Superboy, when he rescues Lana Lang from kidnapper Roscoe Williams (Doug Barr).

episodes.name: Bringing Down the House
episodes.overview: A rock star, Judd Faust, wants the amusement park and puts everyone in danger when the owner refuses to sell it to him. Lana falls in love with Judd but learns of his true nature when he takes her away one night and puts her in a torture device.

episodes.name: The Beast and Beauty
episodes.overview: A Superboy impersonator is robbing banks and jewelry stores to get a million dollars so he can marry Florida's beauty queen.

episodes.name: The Fixer
episodes.overview: Clark discovers that Luthor is trying to fix some of the school's basketball games so that he make a killing in betting. And the way he does that is, that he has a photo of the team's star player in a compromising position that if it got out it would ruin his career.

episodes.name: The Alien Solution
episodes.overview: A strange cloud-like alien who can take over others bodies comes to earth hoping to steal Superboy's body so he can add it to his collection of warriors.

episodes.name: Troubled Waters
episodes.overview: A businessman wants to buy all the farms in the Smallville area during an agricultural depression. Mr. Kent wants to find out why. Kenderson, the businessman, has something to hide and tries to kill Mr. Kent but he is unsuccessful.

episodes.name: The Invisible People
episodes.overview: A large group of homeless people are living in front of a beach club on a Florida beach. They were promised jobs by the wealthy beach club owner, who never gave them anything.

episodes.name: Kryptonite Kills
episodes.overview: A Kryptonite meteor falls in Addis Ababa and is sent to Shuster for study. It turns up in Clark's class on minerals. There, Clark feels the pain of kryptonite for the first time.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Alien (1)
episodes.overview: The alien from "The Alien Solution" escapes after a thief steals the canister containing him. He wants revenge on Superboy for destroying his collection of warrior bodies.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Alien (2)
episodes.overview: Now controlling Pa Kent, the alien makes his move to get revenge. He kidnaps Lana and holds her hostage on a rooftop near Shuster University.

episodes.name: Stand Up and Get Knocked Down
episodes.overview: TJ finds his friend Michael dead outside of the Bonkerz comedy club. TJ wants to find out what happened to him, so he goes to the club's amateur night.

episodes.name: Meet Mr. Mxyzptlk
episodes.overview: Superboy is called on to help remove a totem pole from the ground so it can be studied. When he arrives, the totem won't budge.

episodes.name: Birdwoman of the Swamps
episodes.overview: When a bulldozer is turned over at a construction site, TJ and Clark decide to investigate. Clark meets an old Indian woman who believes the birds turned over the bulldozer.

episodes.name: Terror from the Blue
episodes.overview: After witnessing a police officer being gunned down by a corrupt colleague, Lana is targeted by crooked cops.

episodes.name: War of the Species
episodes.overview: T.J. discovers a government created robot that killed someone. Superboy manages to save him. When a government official tells them that everything is classified they leave. Later the man confronts the creator who seems have other plans. He later grabs T.J. setting a trap for Superboy.

episodes.name: Little Hercules
episodes.overview: Clark and TJ visit a young high school genius named Billy Hercules who has been offered a scholarship by Shuster University. Clark befriends the boy, with whom he can relate as both are different and out of place.

episodes.name: Mutant
episodes.overview: Clark witnesses the kidnapping of Professor Craig Lipcott, a famous nuclear scientist. As Superboy, he follows the kidnappers to a rooftop and sees them enter a strange ship just before he is attacked by a powerful ray that leaves him disoriented.

episodes.name: The Phantom of the Third Division
episodes.overview: Jonathan Kent is being stalked by a man with whom he fought alongside during the Korean War. As Clark, Lana and T.J. come to Smallville for a visit, Mr. Kent is lured to the Smallville hospital and kidnapped by the man.

episodes.name: Black Flamingo
episodes.overview: An attempted assassination of a senator leads Superboy to a mysterious nightclub.

episodes.name: Hollywood
episodes.overview: Professor Zugar, invents a time machine and sends himself and Superboy back in time to Hollywood in the 1930s. Superboy meets a famous actor, Victoria Letour, and discovers that she is being stalked by men who want to kill her.

episodes.name: Succubus
episodes.overview: A beautiful vampire-like creature seeks to drain Superboy of his life force and seduces TJ as part of her plot.

episodes.name: Luthor Unleashed
episodes.overview: Luthor steals a powerful weapon developed by the army and prepares to sell it to weapon dealers. Later, while Luthor is working in the Shuster laboratory, he causes an explosion, and Superboy saves him by blowing the chemical fumes out of the building.

episodes.name: With This Ring, I Thee Kill
episodes.overview: Lex Luthor returns, kidnaps Lana, forces her to marry him, and assumes the identity of a doctor that created a weapon that could paralyze Superboy forever.

episodes.name: Lex Luthor: Sentenced to Death
episodes.overview: Superboy is aided by Professor Peterson and the two believe that he will one day be able to use his legs and powers again. Lex Luthor taunts the superhero with his new bride, Lana.

episodes.name: Metallo
episodes.overview: A heart attack patient, who is also an escaped convict, transforms into a cyborg with a heart powered by kryptonite.

episodes.name: Young Dracula
episodes.overview: Superboy and Lana get caught in the middle of a battle between two vampires.

episodes.name: Nightmare Island
episodes.overview: Trapped on a deserted island after Andy's motorboat sinks, Clark gets stripped of his powers by an alien who also kidnaps Lana.

episodes.name: Bizarro... The Thing of Steel
episodes.overview: Bizarro, an imperfect duplicate of Superboy, is accidentally created when the real Superboy steps in front of Professor Peterson's new duplicating ray.

episodes.name: The Battle with Bizarro
episodes.overview: Superboy battles to free Lana from Bizarro while Prof. Peterson uses his duplicating ray on kryptonite to create Bizarro Kryptonite with the hope that it will end the Bizarro menace.

episodes.name: Mr. and Mrs. Superboy
episodes.overview: Superboy and Lana pretend to be the adoptive parents of Mr. Mxyzptlk when he returns from the fifth dimension to stop the havoc caused when a giant follows him seeking revenge.

episodes.name: Programmed for Death
episodes.overview: Superboy must stop a robot that has reprogrammed itself to avenge the death of its creator by killing both Andy and his father.

episodes.name: Superboy's Deadly Touch
episodes.overview: Superboy is shot with a laser by Lex Luthor that sends his powers out of control and makes him dangerous to others.

episodes.name: The Power of Evil
episodes.overview: A dark, malevolent force breaks its bonds and seeks to eradicate Superboy, the greatest force of good.

episodes.name: Superboy... Rest in Peace
episodes.overview: A female android from the future assists Superboy against another android sent to destroy him.

episodes.name: Super Menace!
episodes.overview: After running tests on kryptonite to try and neutralize its effects on Superboy, the military accidentally alters it so it has emotional effects on him, making him apathetic.

episodes.name: Yellow Peri's Spell of Doom
episodes.overview: A doll belonging to a shy waitress comes to life and turns her into a sorceress and then they both work to make Superboy fall in love with her.

episodes.name: Microboy
episodes.overview: Hoping to impress Lana, a fellow student invents an energy capsule that makes him a superhero, but he is unable to control his new found powers.

episodes.name: Run, Dracula, Run
episodes.overview: A lost serum must be found that keeps vampire cravings at bay before Superboy and Lana become undead forever.

episodes.name: Brimstone
episodes.overview: Superboy falls under the spell of the evil sorcerer Prodo until a mysterious man named Brimstone lends his assistance. Philip Michael Thomas guest stars.

episodes.name: Abandon Earth
episodes.overview: Two aliens, claiming to be Superboy's birth parents, Jor-El and Lana, come to Earth looking for their son.

episodes.name: Escape to Earth
episodes.overview: Superboy finds things get complicated when Lana finds out about his secret identity while on the aliens' ship.

episodes.name: Superstar
episodes.overview: A rock singer faces an attempt on her life.

episodes.name: Nick Knack
episodes.overview: A crazed genius seeks revenge on Superboy for being imprisoned after he develops a suit that steals away the superhero's powers.

episodes.name: The Haunting of Andy McAlister
episodes.overview: While spending the weekend at an Andy's Uncle's old mansion, Andy, Lana and Clark get pulled into a vortex leading to a ghost world.

episodes.name: Revenge from the Deep
episodes.overview: Lana's body is overtaken by a vengeful soul looking to settle a score over unrequited love.

episodes.name: Secrets of Superboy
episodes.overview: After the villain Nick Knack escapes from prison, he captures Lana and Andy and probes their minds discovering Superboys weaknesses. Gilbert Gottfried guest stars.

episodes.name: Johnny Casanova and the Case of Secret Serum
episodes.overview: Johnny Avonasac, a tennis player, finds a mysterious potion left behind by his dead brother that transforms into Johnny Casanova, an overweight slob who also happens to be a magnet for women, including Lana.

episodes.name: The Woman Called Tiger Eye
episodes.overview: A sorceress called Tiger Eye captures Lana and turns her into a snake to lure Superboy into attempting a rescue so she can ensnare him in a spell and make him her own.

episodes.name: The Bride of Bizarro (1)
episodes.overview: Bizarro returns from deep space and enters into a deadly pact with Lex Luthor. Lex will "create" a bride for Bizarro in exchange for a supply of kryptonite which can kill Superboy.

episodes.name: The Bride of Bizarro (2)
episodes.overview: Bizarro has fallen deeper into Lex Luthor's plot to kill Superboy in exchange for a bride.

episodes.name: The Lair
episodes.overview: Superboy is lured into deadly danger, and to survive he must avoid "The Lair."

episodes.name: Neila
episodes.overview: A superhuman woman arrives from an alien world in search of husband, causing destruction in her wake. To stop her, Superboy must pass her romantic test, all while teaching her the true meaning of love.

episodes.name: Roads Not Taken (1)
episodes.overview: An anonymous letter leads Superboy to Darla's hideout, where she has Lana locked in a meatlocker. She's holding Lana to blackmail Superboy, so he'll bring Luthor back through a portal (created by Dr. Winger) that took him to an alternate world. This alternate world is dark, and chaos has erupted as a result of Luthor's murder by an alternate Superboy. As Superboy tries to return Luthor, he and an alternate Dr. Winger attack him with kryptonite.

episodes.name: Roads Not Taken (2)
episodes.overview: Superboy jumps through the portal to escape the kryptonite assault. In this world, he is the "Sovereign," a dictator that rules using fear tactics. Lana and Luthor, lovers in this world, are leading a revolution to overthrow the Sovereign. Lana arms herself with kryptonite bomb to destroy the Sovereign, hurting both versions of Superboy. But when she sets off the bomb, killing them both, the first alternate Superboy rescues the original Superboy from the kryptonite-laden shockwave. When all is done, Superboy destroys the portal.

episodes.name: The Sons of Icarus
episodes.overview: Capital City finds itself in the middle of a mystery as random fires keep appearing all over the city. When Superboy investigates he discovers a connection to an ancient tribe of flying warriors called the Katia.

episodes.name: Carnival
episodes.overview: When Superboy discovers a mysterious carnival that is stealing the souls of its patrons, his moral and physical courage is put to the test.

episodes.name: Test of Time
episodes.overview: Two aliens from a mysterious planet accelerate the time on Earth in order to study Superboy's powers and weaknesses.

episodes.name: Mindscape
episodes.overview: Superboy's life is in peril when an alien creature attaches itself to his body, causing him horrific nightmares in which he battles his alter ego of Clark Kent.

episodes.name: Superboy... Lost
episodes.overview: Superboy experiences amnesia after he is injured trying to stop a speeding meteorite. Now his only hope for remembering who he is lies with the mother and son who found him wounded in the woods.

episodes.name: Special Effects
episodes.overview: A rip in the time continuum has unleashed a wave of deadly creatures. When a prominent movie producer is killed, Superboy must investigate and ultimately fight for his life as the monsters attack.

episodes.name: Neila and the Beast
episodes.overview: Neila, the superwoman from another planet, returns once again to Earth. This time she needs Superboy's help to destroy a gruesome creature who is seeking to kill her.

episodes.name: The Golem
episodes.overview: An elderly Jewish man creates the mythical creature Golem to protect him from racial bigotry. But when Golem goes on a rampage, Superboy has to step in and save the day.

episodes.name: A Day in the Double Life
episodes.overview: Its annual review time and Clark Kent has to recount for his boss a typical day in his life. Carefully working around the excitement he leads as Superboy, Clark paints himself as a boring, all American boy.

episodes.name: Bodyswap
episodes.overview: Lex Luthor tricks Superboy into switching bodies with him, causing mass confusion in Capital City.

episodes.name: Rebirth (1)
episodes.overview: Superboy retreats to Smallville after he thinks he accidentally kills a leader of a dangerous gang. But did he or was it something more mysterious?

episodes.name: Rebirth (2)
episodes.overview: Still in hiding and under scrutiny for a gang leader's murder, Lana leads a campaign to clear Superboy's name.

episodes.name: Werewolf
episodes.overview: Superboy faces one of his most dangerous foes yet in "Werewolf."

episodes.name: People vs. Metallo
episodes.overview: Superboy is put on trial after Metallo overtakes him in court using kryptonite. Can Superboy stop him before it is too late or will he be the one found guilty?

episodes.name: Jackson and Hyde
episodes.overview: It is a dangerous case of split personalities as Superboy battles evil in "Jackson And Hyde."

episodes.name: Mine Games
episodes.overview: Superboy and Lex Luthor have a heart-to-heart after they end up trapped together in a mine.

episodes.name: Wish for Armageddon
episodes.overview: Superboy discovers that he unknowingly entered into a contract with an evil force that uses his dreams to create actual world disasters.

episodes.name: Standoff
episodes.overview: Clark Kent becomes one of many helpless victims in a hostage standoff. Can he save the day without revealing his secret identity?

episodes.name: The Road to Hell (1)
episodes.overview: Superboy is transported to an alternate-reality jungle and turned into a child, where he must fight for his life and avoid the evil alternate version of Lex Luthor.

episodes.name: The Road to Hell (2)
episodes.overview: Barely escaping the jungle, Superboy is transported to another alternate reality where the demented Dr. Winger admits to trapping him. Now Superboy will have to travel back through realities in order to save himself and defeat Lex Luthor.

episodes.name: A Change of Heart (1)
episodes.overview: A wave of violence has broken out within the city, sending Superboy into tension-filled investigation. Little does he know he will soon be accused of murder.

episodes.name: A Change of Heart (2)
episodes.overview: Lana's life is in peril as Adam blackmails Tommy into creating a weapon to kill Superboy.

episodes.name: The Kryptonite Kid
episodes.overview: Kryptonite infects a young scientist during a lab explosion, causing him to use his newfound powers against Superboy.

episodes.name: The Basement
episodes.overview: Lana discovers an alien in her basement who steals her identity.

episodes.name: Darla Goes Ballistic
episodes.overview: A strange formula gives Darla erratic powers, causing her to attack Superboy.

episodes.name: Paranoia
episodes.overview: Paranoia strangles Capital City as residents become fearful of a race of invisible aliens who have just landed.

episodes.name: Know Thine Enemy (1)
episodes.overview: Lex Luthor has a plan to destroy the world's population with a series of dirty bombs, but first he must get rid of Superboy.

episodes.name: Know Thine Enemy (2)
episodes.overview: Superboy is trapped inside Lex Luthor's virtual reality computer program, and now Lana must enter the program to save Superboy before it's too late.

episodes.name: Hell Breaks Loose
episodes.overview: A troublesome ghost is haunting the Bureau, wreaking havoc on the office and its employees. To stop him Superboy and Lana must discover the secret as to how the ghost was killed in the building fifty years earlier.

episodes.name: Into the Mystery
episodes.overview: Trying to protect his Aunt Cassandra, Superboy confronts a force which he cannot win against when death takes a human form.

episodes.name: To Be Human (1)
episodes.overview: While trying to help Bizarro with his depression, Superboy's powers are weakened, leaving him vulnerable to the evil villain Chaos, who plans to destroy him once and for all.

episodes.name: To Be Human (2)
episodes.overview: Bizarro grapples with the choice to be human or resort back to his original self in order to save Superboy from Chaos's destructive plans.

episodes.name: West of Alpha Centauri
episodes.overview: Superboy is kidnapped by an alien force and taken to a paradise planet near Alpha Centauri. Will he ever return?

episodes.name: Threesome (1)
episodes.overview: A prison psychiatrist helps Lex Luthor and Metallo escape, all three quickly turning their attention to stopping Superboy once and for all.

episodes.name: Threesome (2)
episodes.overview: Superboy continues to battle the newly formed threesome of Lex Luthor, Metallo and Dr. Odessa Vexman. As their destructive potential continues to rise, Superboy must stop them before it's too late.

episodes.name: Out of Luck
episodes.overview: Superboy continues to battle evil in "Out Of Luck."

episodes.name: Who is Superboy?
episodes.overview: Superboy's secret identity is challenged in "Who Is Superboy?"

episodes.name: Cat and Mouse
episodes.overview: Superboy gets entangled in a dangerous game of "Cat And Mouse."

episodes.name: Obituary for a Super Hero
episodes.overview: Lex Luthor has just hit Superboy with a deadly kryptonite bomb. Now he gloriously recounts in detail how he planned and executed the devious plan, which he feels certain has killed Superboy.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: A gym owner is using the blood of his younger customers, along with a gold derivative, to keep himself young. This results in an acceleration in the victims' aging process.

episodes.name: Rites of Passage (1)
episodes.overview: Superboy looses his powers and now an investigation begins to discover the curious force that caused it.

episodes.name: Rites of Passage (2)
episodes.overview: Superboy is on the verge of losing his powers forever, which causes his alter ego of Clark Kent to search for the elusive crystal which holds the key to his past and will ultimately lead him through his "Rites Of Passage."
